newsitem.title: FRANCE: Four French policemen probed on rape charges.
newsitem.headline: Four French policemen probed on rape charges.

text.p: A French policeman was placed under investigation on rape charges and three others for complicity in rape on Thursday in the southwestern city of Bordeaux, justice sources said.
One of the police officers was accused of taking a 33-year-old woman to her home and raping her on March 8 after she was in a car accident while under the influence of alcohol, the sources said.
He was suspected of returning to her home a week later with the three other officers.
The four men were questioned by police from the internal affairs department and the rapist was detained, the justice sources said.
